fireDescription: The area was exposed to a massive fire. Despite the ferocity of the fire, the fire did not result in any casualties. The authorities believe that the fire was caused by a pressure vessel explosion
artDescription: Artist Munster Chetwynd poses next to one of her artworks, at the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art, in Edinburgh
sportsDescription: New crisis in Manchester United today
discoveriesDescription: New historical assets have been found and are being investigated in Egypt
